summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Management and Planning authorizing the Director of the Office of Management and Planning to execute a grant agreement with the National Urban and Community Forestry Advisory Council, through the 1996 Challenge Cost-Share Grant Program for federal financial assistance, to develop public information and education and materials and activity tools about Seattle's urban forests; authorizing the acceptance of grant funds to be received; and authorizing the hiring of a consultant(s); by a three-fourths vote of City Council.
